name: OrderActionStatus
comment: Contains values that are to represent the status of an order action during the various phases of its life cycle.Examples of order action statuses include:* IN - Initial. Represents the status when an order action is created.* NE - In Negotiation. Represents the status when the negotiation phase of an order action begins. * DE - In Delivery. Represents the status when the milestone commitment is achieved.
vf short description: Contains values that are to represent the status of an order action during the various phases of its life cycle.Examples of order action statuses include:* IN - Initial. Represents the status when an order action is created.* NE - In Negotiation.

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: OrderActionStatusKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the order action status in ALDM. Each order action status key value represents a unique order action status.

fields.name: OrderActionStatusDesc
fields.comment: Describes the order action status.Valid values are:- IN (Initial) - When an order action is created, the status is set to Initial.- NE (In Negotiation) - When the negotiation phase of an order action begins, the status is set to In Negotiation.- DE (In Delivery) - When the milestone, Commit is achieved, the related order action status is set to In Delivery.- NO (In Notification) - When the milestone, Complete is achieved, the related order action status is set to In Notification.- DO (Done) - When the milestone, Done is achieved, the related order action status is set to Done.- TC (To Be Cancelled) - During a two step cancellation, the order action that is involved in a cancel process is first set to To Be Cancelled. Later, when the Terminate Order Action AH is executed, the order action status is changed to Cancel.- CA (Cancelled) - An order action status is set to Cancel when the order is cancelled successfully.- RE (Rejected) - When an order action is rejected, the status is set to Rejected.- AM (Amend) - An order action status is set to Cancel when a successful amend occurs.- FI (Fictitious) - A fictitious order action is used for notification purposes.

fields.name: OrderActionStatusId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the order action status in the source system.

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
